meta.hint: Antonyms are opposites. Example - big, little
meta.question: Select the antonym of the word in bold.

content.description: Select the antonym of correct . I think you are correct .
Select the antonym of easy. The rules of the game are quiet easy.
Select the antonym of early . She woke up early today.
Select the antonym of cold . It's too cold outside.
Select the antonym of ask . You can ask me anything you want.
Select the antonym of healthy . She is looking healthy now.
Select the antonym of thick . Please, give me a thick board.
Select the antonym of empty . The bowl is empty .
Select the antonym of young . He is young .
Select the antonym of weak . You are too weak .
